about_the_game:
This demo includes a gauntlet and the first 4 levels of the game.

Slash, Parry, Shoot and dodge roll your way through the Neo-Nippon Yakuza to avenge your pet Dogsuke and take on the top brass and baddest hit squad in all of Neo Nippon, the Ryujin Ichizoku!


Lightning Katana is a fast-paced action FPS with hype parries, and even faster beats inspired by the likes of Hotline Miami, Katana Zero, and Devil May Cry.

Slash, Parry, Shoot and dodge roll your way through the Neo-Nippon Yakuza to avenge your pet Dogsuke and take on the top brass and baddest hit squad in all of Neo Nippon, the Ryujin Ichizoku!



Featuring:

Lightning Fast Fury

Always be moving with quick dodge rolls and perfect parries to slash your way through the Neo-Yakuza stronghold. Hesitation can mean death, and you go down almost as fast as your enemies.

Flashy Elements

Defeat empowered enemies to temporarily gain their abilities. Shoot a powerful lightning bolt that fries anything in its path, or ride the winds of Fujin to slice through any yakuza that stand in your way.

SSStylish Combos

Chain together kills to earn S, SS and HYPE ranks in each level and compete on the leaderboards to find the fastest and hypest level routes
